title: New update ruined the game.
text: Used to be a terrific game that I spent hours playing and plenty of money on. Then they took away the board reset feature. Now levels are impossible and boosters you paid for can start in an impossible and pointless place on the board and you can‚Äôt reset them. Deleted and cured of my addiction!

title: Again!! Annoyed with latest update!!!
text:
DECEMBER 5, 2019

Just started playing Candy Crush a few weeks ago but was told by friends that there had been some improvements and should try again!  I did and agreed that it was improved.  Been sick so not played for a week & played today and now I find that I cannot look at a level without losing my latest upgrade on boosters!!  Cannot believe that they have changed that!  I like to look to see what the level requirements are before selecting from my boosters!  It is very irritating that this has been changed after years of it not being a loss of boosters if I exit! 

I updated and now I am losing lives, 20 lives so far, every time it crashes which is frequently!!!  Does anyone test before releasing updates?

PREVIOUS UPDATE:  Liked the game but has too many quirks!  Lose friend emails, sending requests for lives touch one friend and get multiple due to sensitivity.  Been stuck this level for three weeks but do not receive the 3 extra shots but am constantly prompted to send for other friends stuck.  Then hear from friends this new feature does not work!  No surprise considering all the other issues!  I am with the others on this, way too many pleasurable games to play out there, why deal with the frustration!  Delete!

title: Taking away being able to reset board
text: Agreed with others on here latest update boo! It was nice being able to reset the board if we hadn‚Äôt made a move yet this new updates a no go. That feature was one reason I liked candy crush please bring it back

title: Disappointed
text: I have been playing Candy Crush for years and am disappointed with the developers that they would take away the option to reset the game. Why would they care if you reset the board?! It‚Äôs bad enough that most levels once you get higher up, I‚Äôm on level 3623, can‚Äôt be won without a booster now I can‚Äôt reset the board if I don‚Äôt like it! Are they really that greedy?

title: Level 5876
text: I have been playing Candy crush for years now sadly the past year or so has been horrible. Levels are extremely difficult to pass ((including 5876 I‚Äôve been here for days now)) you either need loads of boosters to pass or a lucky board. The one good thing we have was being able to leave the game before you made a move that which allowed us to rest the level and now you have gone and taken that away form us... why? I use to love this game. I looked forward to it and now I dread opening it up. This Game causes nothing but stress and aggravation. Maybe it‚Äôs truly time to walk away from this mess you have created.  You have taken all the fun away... are you proud of yourselves? And yes I have spent real money on this game. Thanks for nothing

title: Why did you remove unlimited shuffling
text: Fun game until most recent update and now if you click to play a level and exit without making any moves you lose a life.  UNACCEPTABLE CHANGE IT BACK

title: Fun game

title: Aggravating fun...
text: Fun game overall but the free spin wheel with the "jackpot" spot is a joke. Been playing for years but everytime I spin it gets more aggravating since NO ONE LANDS ON IT!!

title: Let me exit a level before it starts!!!
text:
please bring back the ability to exit a level before you start or make any moves without losing a life. (Unless it‚Äôs a timed level- I get it the times already started). There‚Äôs reasons we need to exit before starting- one being forgetting to click or un-click a booster. Two- sometimes YOU the app maker trick us into opening the level we just finished, and now because we can‚Äôt exit without losing a life- you better pray you‚Äôll pass it again (unlikely in the 5,000‚Äôs!!) so you don‚Äôt lose that life and whatever boosters you‚Äôve scraped together (robot body parts, space ships, or the current one- Christmas stocking). And God forbid you accidentally click on a past level...
Seems like just more of the same: y‚Äôall finding ways to make more money... but listen... this ‚Äúupdate‚Äù will likely cause this years and years loyal player (who‚Äôs spent a great amount of money on bars and boosters!), to call it quits. You already make it impossible to pass these advanced levels unless you spend money for more moves or boosters. Let us have this. THANKS üôèüèº

title: Update removes opt-out option on bad boards
text: Been playing this game for FIVE YEARS. Most helpful thing to keep me playing was the long-standing option to opt out of a level WITHOUT PENALTY if the board looked crappy. Now you‚Äôre stuck playing what it gives you; if you want a new board, you lose a life. Greedy

title: Waste of time
text: I was stuck on an level a friend told me to buy some lives so I did ! I finally won the level! I‚Äôm stuck again ! My friend is also stuck on a level, neither of us are eligible for a free spin! The only help is to buy lives! I have no intentions on buying lives just to win a level! I might occasionally buy lives but it should not be the expectation that it has become! My friend and I have watched the pattern and if you buy lives you will win the level! If this continues I will delete this game! There is no reason to be stuck on a level for days! Without help except pay! No video to watch nor a chance to spin for long periods of time!

title: passes time
text:
nice game to play when bored. 
although, i‚Äôve been playing this game for 8 years. i‚Äôve never won the jackpot on the booster wheel. some levels are repeated. and on the levels where the objective is to get the fruit down OR collect the keys to unlock gels/fruits, the keys or fruits are released when there‚Äôs less than 5 moves left!? doesn‚Äôt make sense when i need to get 5 fruits in less than 5 turns but i don‚Äôt see the first fruit until the last two moves. 
seems like we get ripped off a lot with this game. 
upside- i like the free boosters and extra videos to earn more boosters or chances to earn moves.
